name: MTLCommandEncoderErrorState
desc: Possible error conditions for the command encoder’s commands.

items.name: case unknown
items.desc: The execution status of the commands in this buffer is unknown or wasn’t set.

items.name: case affected
items.desc: The commands associated with the encoder failed to fully execute because of an error.

items.name: case completed
items.desc: The commands associated with the encoder completed without any errors.

items.name: case faulted
items.desc: The commands associated with the encoder caused an error.

items.name: case pending
items.desc: The commands associated with the encoder never executed.
